title: Acer Swift 5 (2022) hands-on: A beautiful laptop with a 16:10 display
content:
AtÂ  MWC 2022, Acer introduced two new laptops: The Swift 3 and the more premium Swift 5. After having the chance to try out the Acer Swift 3 a couple of weeks ago, Acer also sent me the Acer Swift 5 so I could take a closer look at it. To be clear, this is

The post Acer Swift 5 (2022) hands-on: A beautiful laptop with a 16:10 display appeared first on XDA.
description: The 2022 Acer Swift 5 packs a taller 16:10 display and Intel's P-series processors into a stunning chassis. Here are our early impressions.
